name: Barnyard Golem
description: The Barnyard Golem is a medium-sized construct resembling a rural guardian, built from various agricultural materials. It has a massive form derived from barnyard elements, with a rough texture and an imposing presence.
memorable: It can absorb lightning damage to heal itself, making it a unique and resilient combatant in battle.
goals: To serve as a guardian or defender in rural settings, protecting its domain from threats.
relations: Associated with agricultural settings, it may be found alongside farm animals or in the company of other constructs.
strengths: Exemplifies high strength, durability, and several immunities to conditions and damage types.
weaknesses: Limited agility and intelligence, making it susceptible to cunning and mobile opponents.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with a powerful bite and a devastating wing slap, also capable of expelling poison in a cone.
most_powerful_ability: Chymus Expulsion, which unleashes a cone of poison damage affecting multiple targets.
skills: Has an average perception skill, but can be easily distracted.
additional_information: Immune to charm and fear effects.
Construct nature allows it to operate without basic needs.
Can heal itself using lightning damage.
Magic resistance provides advantage against spells.

golem that uses poison and bludgeoning attacks
